name: Penmark's Book of Imaginary Animals
description:
GitHub: adfr05t/Penmarks-Book-Of-Imaginary-Animals

This is a game I made (and am continuing to work on) while studying a Unity Developer skills bootcamp with Mastered Studios. It features turn based combat using cards and dice, which I implemented using scriptable objects. The biggest challenges were writing the opponent AI and creating the framework for the turn-based mechanic.
